p: As indicated by the UV and RFC values, mango ( Mangifera indica) was the most cited vegetable in the present study. As a native species [ 51], Mangifera indica has been used by Myanmar people for a long time [ 52] and in multiple ways. A well-known proverb states that “Mango us the best fruit and tea leaf is the best leaf” [ 53]. Mango leaves are used as medicine to treat diarrhoea, and the young sour fruits are made into salad, while mature sweet fruits are one of the most famous tropical fruits.
